articles.title: Sunita Williams 'Gardening' In Space As 10-Day Test Flight Stretches Beyond 50 - NDTV
articles.description: Having taken off on Boeing Starliner's maiden flight for what was supposed to be a 10-day mission, Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams has now been in space for 50 days and counting.
articles.content:
Ms Williams and Butch Wilmore also participated in vein scans using an ultrasound device.
